column2: Premiums will continue to soar double digits and even triple digits in many cases.
column4: Obamacare premiums nationwide have increased by double and triple digits.

column2: Our budget calls for one of the single largest increases in defense spending history in this country.
column4: Says his budget "calls for one of the largest increases in national defense spending in American history."

column2: 50 days  we've already experienced an unprecedented 40percent reduction in illegal immigration on our Southern border 61 percent since Inauguration Day  61 percent.
column4: In the first full month of my administration following the issuance of my executive orders, illegal immigration on our southern border fell by an unprecedented 40 percent.
